item.title: Report X-2023120851
item.description:
Report X-2023120851

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: WAYCROSS
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package had come down the vanline possibly just thrown onto the IC belt. DescribePack: The hazardous materials were shipped inside glass containers with the cap protected by Styrofoam and put inside a plastic bag inside another fiberboard box. The glass broke upon impact of handling. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was collected immediately and places inside yellow salvage drum to prevent further spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023120627
item.description:
Report X-2023120627

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: BRASELTON
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Internal leakage, no damage to the package. DescribePack: No holes or cracks, it did get wet from the internal spill. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately placed in a hazmat bin. Oil dry was administered to the spill on the floor.
